content.html: Being an open-source maintainer in 2021: since yesterday I have: - people in my personal DMs calling me a douche for not helping them debug their problems in my DMs - people saying “f*ck you Homebrew” (their censoring, not mine) in my personal email for a new Homebrew release
content.value:
Being an open-source maintainer in 2021: since yesterday I have:

- people in my personal DMs calling me a douche for not helping them debug their problems in my DMs

- people saying “f*ck you Homebrew” (their censoring, not mine) in my personal email for a new Homebrew release
